content: Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Jul 2019If i want to buy in Cromwell European REIT, which stock code should I buy into? SGX:CFSU or SGX:CNNU?If i want to buy in Cromwell European REIT, which stock code should I buy into? SGX:CFSU or SGX:CNNU?2 answersAnswerBump0

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 09 Jul 2019CNNU. I could not find CFSU, it doesn't seem to be a valid code.3 comments5

See all 3 comments Question Poster08 Jul 2019Hi, sorry the stock code is CSFUElijah Lee09 Jul 2019CNNU is the EUR denominated security. CSFU is SGD denominated. It depends on whether you are willing to expose yourself to EUR currency (forex risk)

Thomas KooLevel 3. WonderkidUpdated on 09 Jul 2019Hi QP,SGX:CNNU is in Euro, SGX:CSFU is in S$Besides FX risk, you may want to take heed of recent Europe developments e.g. BREXIT, financial sector shake ups, at a longer term.For shorter term, a split of 50-50 holding maybe advisable.0 comments0
